name: Out Of time (itch) (arctaeon)
description:
Controls:

  • F to interact (open chests, switch levers)
  • A to move left
  • D to move right
  • Space to jump
  • Left mouse to shoot
  • Right mouse to aim
  • E to switch weapons (once unlocked)

Created for MetroidVania Month 17

My first ever MetroidVania, was really fun. Started about halfway through and definitely wish I had more time, but am happy with the result.

Tools:

  • Unity3D 2021
  • Ldtk
  • Aseprite
  • Color Palette: "Eroge Copper"

Credits:

All assets created by me except..

Why did you eat his skin? [Creepy, Ominous Chiptune - Gameboy sounds] - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=742NOjtnHAM
